Summary: Strange object with lights hovering, darting, glowing, pulsating
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsmy boyfriend and i had stepped outside on our 3-season room to smoke a cigarette, when i noticed a light crossing the sky from left to right. when the light passed behind a group of trees, i waited for it to emerge from the other side, but it never did. i then noticed a very large glowing light that would flash atop a big tree in my back yard. it then fell like a leaf a few feet further down the tree and continued to glow, flash and change colors, including a red and a blue-green. it then went dark and flashed 50 feet over to the the right, went dark, reappeared and changed directions and then hovered by a tree in my neigbors yard for a few seconds. it then reappeared again several hundred feet over to the left and back in my yard before it disappeared. i felt so bewildered that when i finally went to bed, i couldn't fall asleep. i went back out to the patio around an hour later and after several minutes saw a larger(but still small) diamondish shaped object crossing the sky about 75-100 yards away, while pulsating\fluttering brilliant lights that were changing from red, to white to blue-green. i observered it in this solid form for at least 90 seconds before it disappeared into the night.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Grove City
There were no other sightings in Grove City on or around May 26th 2012
